cc2.settings.no_permissions.arcadia: You don't have permissions to change the settings. Only the host can change the settings!
cc2.settings.no_permissions.public: You don't have permissions to change the settings. %s to get permission!
cc2.item.dynamite.name: Dynamite
cc2.item.turret.name: Turret
cc2.item.turret.desc:
Can be placed down
and shoots the closest enemy.
cc2.item.slime.name: Slime
cc2.item.slime.desc:
Lets you jump higher,
run faster and nullifies
fall damage for 25 sec.
cc2.item.cactus.name: Cactus
cc2.item.cactus.desc:
Damages nearby enemies and
enemies who attack you for 25 sec.
cc2.item.arrow_shield.name: Arrow Shield
cc2.item.arrow_shield.desc: Protects you from arrows for 25 sec.
cc2.item.propeller_helmet.name: Propeller Helmet
cc2.item.propeller_helmet.desc:
Lets you fly by
sneaking for 25 sec.
cc2.item.ender_orb.name: Ender Orb
cc2.item.ender_orb.desc:
Allows you to teleport
in the direction you're
facing for 25 sec.
cc2.item.bomb_arrows.name: Bomb Arrows
cc2.item.bomb_arrows.desc:
Lets you shoot
exploding arrows for 20 sec.
cc2.item.console.name: Console
cc2.item.console.desc:
Forces an enemy to
execute commands for 13 sec.
cc2.item.drill.name: Drill
cc2.item.drill.desc: Digs a deep hole in front of you.
cc2.item.teleporter.name: Teleporter
cc2.item.teleporter.desc: Teleports you to a random player.
cc2.item.cloud_bottle.name: Cloud in a Bottle
cc2.item.firework_rocket.name: Firework Rocket
cc2.item.firework_rocket.desc: Shoots you high into the sky.
cc2.item.lightning_rod.name: Lightning Rod
cc2.item.lightning_rod.desc:
Summons a lightning
in the direction you're facing.
It paralyzes your enemies
and drops their items.
cc2.item.beetroot.name: Beetroot
cc2.item.beetroot.desc:
Fills the inventory of
an enemy with beetroots.
cc2.item.beetroot_filler.name: Useless Beetroot
cc2.item.spawn_egg.name: Spawn Egg
cc2.item.spawn_egg.desc:
Spawns an allied mob
which grants you
temporary support.
cc2.item.scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
cc2.item.laser_eye.name: Laser Eye
cc2.settings.gamemode.name: Item mode
cc2.settings.gamemode.default.name: Default Mode
cc2.settings.gamemode.default.desc:
Yellow item crates
spawn throughout the arena
cc2.settings.gamemode.damage.name: Damage Mode
cc2.settings.gamemode.damage.desc:
Obtain items by
causing damage to enemies.
cc2.settings.gamemode.none.desc:
No items will spawn
during the game.
cc2.settings.item_amount.name: Item amount
cc2.settings.item_amount.desc: How many items spawn during the game.
cc2.settings.team_size.name: Team size
cc2.settings.team_size.desc:
The number of players
fitting into one team.
cc2.settings.team_amount.name: Team amount
cc2.settings.glass_border.name: Glass border
cc2.settings.glass_border.desc: Determines if the cube has a glass border
cc2.settings.disassembler.name: Disassembler
cc2.settings.disassembler.desc: Disassembles the arena after the selected amount of time.
